text: Alfred George Barratt (13 April 1920 – 2002) was an English professional footballer who played as a defender. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Kettering Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Weldon F.C. players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Northampton Town F.C. players Category:Stewart & Lloyds F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Southport F.C. players Category:English Football League players
